mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.type as "type", a.title as "title", a.content as "content", a.level as "level", a.users as "users", a.create_by as "createBy", a.create_date as "createDate", a.status as "status"
mapper.insert: insert into sys_msg_send( type, title, content, level, users, create_by, create_date, status ) values( #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{level}, #{users}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update sys_msg_send set type=#{type}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, level=#{level}, users=#{users}, create_by=#{createBy}, create_date=#{createDate}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
